WELCOME.title: Strengthening environmental protection for the effective control of air quality monitoring and emissions trading system, in order to achieve better air quality in the Republic of Croatia

INTRO.p1: The project aims to improve the air quality monitoring and emissions trading system to mitigate climate change and improve the overall state of the environment and air pollution in the Republic of Croatia.
INTRO.p2: The project will improve environmental inspections and allow effective supervision of air quality monitoring and all entities in accordance with the requirements of the emissions trading system.
INTRO.p3: The value of the project is 425,000 euros, with 90% of the contracted amount financed from IPA 2013 EU Programme for Croatia, and 10% is a national co-financing.
